column5: Hi,Everybody !My name is Karl.I'm new here . I'm living in North York . I love fishing for Muskies,Walleyes and LM /SM BASSS ......... Any suggestion for the long weekend ? Even the weather is pretty bad , but i still wanna go out and try . what about Toronto Island for Pike ? or anywhere for steelhead? Thank u all!
pike is closed for now, till second sat in may, maybe the humber? or credit? for steelies...
suggestion, keep your eyes open to the weather forecasts i hear its sposed to stay quite cool during the next week....
